episode_event_pasiosalon_date_ch0126_00_: Phew... We sure did explore a lot of Pasio today.

We discovered so many new spots! What a
fruitful day!
But now I’m getting tired. Let’s take a break.

It’s a long way back to town, but we can walk it
once we’ve rested a bit!
The sky sure is beautiful...

Sometimes the best part of strolling through nature
is taking a break to soak it all in.

That was one of my favorite parts of helping my
father with fieldwork back in Hoenn.

Sometimes I would go off to survey on my own
without my father.

I was never lonely, though...because I was always
surrounded by Pokémon!

Come to think of it, before Brendan moved to
Littleroot Town, I didn’t have any friends my
own age.
That’s why I’m having so much fun now!

Here on Pasio, I have you and Brendan, and I’ve
also made so many other new friends!
So...

I wanted to say thank you for being my
friend, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
All right, let’s start heading back to town!

Can I invite you out again
sometime, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
I have a spot I want to show you! It’s a surprise!
Ta-daaa!
This is my Pasio secret base!
As you can see...I haven’t decorated it yet.

Hmm... If this is going to be my secret base, how
should I use this long space?

It could be fun to put some note mats down so
that music plays when I step on them...
Oh, so you see...

We could put out all sorts of decorations in our
secret bases back in Hoenn.

There were dolls and chairs as well as mats that
played musical notes when you walked on them.
You could even place pitfall mats!

So I had an idea. You and I could make a secret
base together...

Then we could invite all our friends on Pasio over
and surprise them!
What do you think? Want to work together?
Of course!
Awesome! Thank you!
Do you think we can pull it off?

Don’t worry! I’ll teach you everything you need
to know!

It’s decided, then! Today we’ll begin creating our
secret base!

[Name:PlayerNickname ], if there is ever
something you’d like to do together, just let
me know!
Hehe...
I guess this is the start of our secret friendship!
